text: Area code 931 is a telephone area code in the state of Tennessee, United States. It was created on September 15, 1997, when it was split from area code 615. Area code 931 covers a large region in Middle Tennessee. Some of the major cities and towns in this area code include Clarksville, Columbia, Cookeville, Tullahoma, and Crossville. 931
title: Area code 931
